title: You Said It, I Drew It!
body:
Going to be posting a few of your guy's ideas from that thread I posted earlier in the week. I should post some more in this thread by the end of the day. 

Old Thread : http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/g6kVvcH4-you-say-it-i-draw-it?comment=0006000000000000

replies.body: That Yorick / Taric / Zac one is awesome!  Thanks!  :)

yorick/taric/zac one, rito plz! {{item:3070}} 
I actually want those as a skin set.
Wait for OP Taric, Deliverer Yorick, and Who's Zac? Zac.
http://i.ytimg.com/vi/6aqf_irqq-M/hqdefault.jpg

i have quite a few :3 5 to be exact but i'll start small so im thinking a guy with pure white hair scar over his right eye, he is wearing a dark red coat with both sleeves torn off. under he has a black chained shirt and just as black pant (heres where it gets complicated) (you know Udyrs spirit guard skin where the claws glow.) (and kha gath? has evolution cycles) this character should have evolution cycles through dragon fazes. so in one he has dragon scales and tail. in another glowing wings. n the third he has glowing claws that go up to his elbows. lol :3 kinda wanna see how it turns out
